sentence.Network_en: He was ill - equipped to handle the flashy showmanship of Birdsong.

entry.def: is a person's skill at performing or presenting things in an entertaining and dramatic way.

means.word_mean: 1. the ability to present something (especially theatrical shows) in an attractive manner
